lead_paragraph: The African Union also failed to endorse Col. Muammar el-Qaddafi’s push for the creation of a United States of Africa.
snippet: The African Union also failed to endorse Col. Muammar el-Qaddafi’s push for the creation of a United States of Africa.

headline.main: After Losing a Post, Qaddafi Rebukes the African Union
headline.print_headline: After Losing a Post, Qaddafi Rebukes the African Union
